New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 12 月 8 日星期日 08:16:05 +0000 zh 1每小时1
One of three motorcyclists killed in SH1 crash named: Lesley Brooks, mum of three, remembered by NZ clubs https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/one-of- Three-motorcyclists-killed-in-sh1-crash-named-lesley-brooks-mum-of- Three-remembered-by-nz-clubs/ 77POUJQYYBCPDKP4L5GYY2WVQM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/one-of- Three-motorcyclists-killed-in-sh1-crash-named-lesley-brooks-mum-of- Three-remembered-by-nz-clubs/ 77POUJQYYBCPDKP4L5GYY2WVQM/ Raphael FranksLesley Brooks, 46, was a member of the Road Pirates MC. Cause of crash remains in doubt. Sun, 08 Dec 2024 06:53:05 +0000 Brooks and two others were killed in the crash near Utiku, south of Taihape, just after 8.10am yesterday. The other two, both men, have yet to be publically named. Photo / Supplied
Art by the River opens with pinache in Whanganui https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/whanganui-midweek/art-by-the-river-opens-with-pinache-in-whanganui/IWQWXZNLNJHSNB6V3NBZE26JXU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/whanganui-midweek/art-by-the-river-opens-with-pinache-in-whanganui/IWQWXZNLNJHSNB6V3NBZE26JXU/ Steve CarleWhanganui’s newest art gallery opened in style on Friday. Sun, 08 Dec 2024 06:24:32 +0000 Attendees at the opening of Art by the River, with Mike Geers, owner of sister gallery Art by the Sea, Takapuna, talking to artist Jana Branca on the right and centre - Helen Garner, chief executive of Business Whanganui - Chamber of Commerce.
Missing woman found dead: Woodend Beach search ends after police appeal for sightings https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-missing-at-woodend-beach-canterbury-police-launch-appeal-for-sightings-amid-familys-concern/ZRDMCG4YABBTDLCOQGEMFYY2PI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-missing-at-woodend-beach-canterbury-police-launch-appeal-for-sightings-amid-familys-concern/ZRDMCG4YABBTDLCOQGEMFYY2PI/ Henriette, 54, last seen at Woodend Beach yesterday morning. Sun, 08 Dec 2024 06:04:14 +0000 Henriette's family have serious concerns about her given she has not been seen since yesterday morning. Photo / New Zealand Police
Police monitoring up to 100 dirt bikers spotted heading through Auckland; five arrested https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-monitoring-more-than-100-dirt-bikers-spotted-heading-through-auckland/7VMMYVI3GRG4BOZAFZ5MZ2RVGI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-monitoring-more-than-100-dirt-bikers-spotted-heading-through-auckland/7VMMYVI3GRG4BOZAFZ5MZ2RVGI/ One person said they saw a large group of unruly riders being followed by police. Sun, 08 Dec 2024 05:58:21 +0000 Police confiscate a number of motorcycles after a gang of dirt bike riders was apprehended in on Puketutu Island in Mangere this afternoon, resulting in several arrests. Photo / Hayden Woodward
Weather: ‘Balmy’ temperatures stick around but rain returns; Bridge Hill fire contained https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-balmy-temporals-stick-around-but-rain-returns-bridge-hill-fire-contained/KMCTZW65YBGGLC65AM36VXECV4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-balmy-temporals-stick-around-but-rain-returns-bridge-hill-fire-contained/KMCTZW65YBGGLC65AM36VXECV4/ Temperatures will remain in the low to high 20s this week. Sun, 08 Dec 2024 05:27:21 +0000 Kiwis should expect a mixed weather bag next week as balmy conditions remain but rain is forecast to return in sporadic spells.
Person dies after crash in Little River, Canterbury: Scene examination on State Highway 75 completed https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/person-dies-after-crash-in-little-river-canterbury-scene-examination-on-state-highway-75-completed/LDZDIWNYYREI5MR362EO3N7V5M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/person-dies-after-crash-in-little-river-canterbury-scene-examination-on-state-highway-75-completed/LDZDIWNYYREI5MR362EO3N7V5M/ The crash happened on State Highway 75 in Little River. Chenyi Wang sentencing: Chinese immigrant blames Covid isolation for criminal syndicate recruitment https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/chenyi-wang-sentencing-chinese-immigrant-blames-covid-isolation-for-criminal-syndicate-recruitment/PRDS5Z64NVFJZOCEJCCYJXVW6Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/chenyi-wang-sentencing-chinese-immigrant-blames-covid-isolation-for-criminal-syndicate-recruitment/PRDS5Z64NVFJZOCEJCCYJXVW6Y/ Craig KapitanLoneliness made him vulnerable to exploitation, his lawyer said. Sun, 08 Dec 2024 05:00:00 +0000 Chenyi Wang's sentencing follows his guilty pleas to 13 charges in August, with his initial offending traced back to January 2021.
Three motorcyclists killed in crash on State Highway 1: Club president says police investigating whether car was on wrong side of road https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Three-motorcyclists-killed-in-crash-on-state-highway-1-club-president-says-theyve-been-told-car-was-on-错误一侧/7BZ2YQZPDNFA3MBQPPAH2R4RJI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Three-motorcyclists-killed-in-crash-on-state-highway-1-club-president-says-theyve-been-told-car-was-on-错误一侧/7BZ2YQZPDNFA3MBQPPAH2R4RJI/ Police said it was too early to comment on the cause of the crash. Family harm: Armed police close major route through Whangārei this afternoon https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/family-harm-armed-police-close-major-route-through-whangarei-this-afternoon/7AFNCN5MFNEFDGUCEZO73TLHOM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/family-harm-armed-police-close-major-route-through-whangarei-this-afternoon/7AFNCN5MFNEFDGUCEZO73TLHOM/ Sarah CurtisArmed police have closed major road through Whangārei as an incident unfolds Sun, 08 Dec 2024 03:23:59 +0000 A motorist took this photograph while stuck in traffic at an armed police roadblock in central Whangārei this afternoon. (Used with permission.)
Council to discuss fluoride-free water options for Tauranga https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/council-to-discuss-fluide-free-water-options-for-tauranga/EZMBFJDATFFG7AMGR2HZZ2HGDI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/council-to-discuss-fluide-free-water-options-for-tauranga/EZMBFJDATFFG7AMGR2HZZ2HGDI/ Alisha EvansSupplying unfluoridated water to Tauranga locals will be discussed at a meeting on Monday.
